review: I am extremely impressed with the Graph Tech String Saver Classics Strat & Tele 2-1/16" Spacing Chrome saddles. The build quality is top-notch, and the chrome finish looks great on my guitar. The saddles significantly reduce string breakage, which has been a persistent issue for me. The Teflon inserts enhance the sound, adding more sustain and clarity. While there are some concerns about the height adjustment screws, the overall performance and durability make this a worthwhile investment. Highly recommend!
